Posts.Content: Aug 1, 2008 03:54PM carolynk wrote: I'm really worried about the drain.  I was told I'll only need one since I'm having a uni mast. from my PS but I'd like to see what my breast surgeon says about that. I'll bet she'll say two and I really hope not. Some people say it's just annoying but I don't know..I'm glad I read what you all have written.  I'm going to get some of that medical tape, Dani.  I dont' want that thing falling out. I'm also going to get a corset with inside pockets that hold drains.  My surgery is next Thursday.  I'm sure I'll be back here when I'm home so I can vent about the drain or maybe it wan't be as bad as I'm anticipating..Hope not!
Posts.Title: Help with drains califsun otter
